original_text: For it is with your heart that you believe and are justified, and it is with your mouth that you profess your faith and are saved.
korean_text: 사람이 마음으로 믿어 의에 이르고 입으로 시인하여 구원에 이르느니라

sentences.original_text: For it is with your heart that you believe
and it is with your mouth that you profess your faith
